description:
Jonouchi duels valiantly, but Dinosaur Ryuzaki has unleashed his secret weapon: Red-Eyes B. Dragon!  Jonouchi must figure out the secret of Yugi’s gift, the Time Wizard card, without Yugi’s help or he’s taking the next boat out of  Duelist Kingdom!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuroki Honoo! Red Eyes Black Dragon
黒き炎! レッドアイズ・ブラックドラゴン
